unit.utterance: u hka chyang ai lam.
unit.utterance_translation: The story about why the crow is black.

unit.utterance: u hka a ntsam chyang ai lam
unit.utterance_translation: The story about why the color of the crow is black.

unit.utterance: e moi de da
unit.utterance_translation: Well, long ago, it's said,

unit.utterance: u ni manau nau na rai yang
unit.utterance_translation: when the birds danced the Manau dance

unit.utterance: wora manau poi de sa na matu
unit.utterance_translation: in order to go to the Manau festival

unit.utterance: u ni shada shakya.
unit.utterance_translation: the birds dressed each other up.

unit.utterance: e shakya yang
unit.utterance_translation: Well, (they) dressed up and

unit.utterance: e hkam hkam u gaw
unit.utterance_translation: well, because the Hkamhkam bird (said),

unit.utterance: ngai gaw poi sa na matu bu hpun palawng n lu ai.
unit.utterance_translation: "I don't have dress to go to the festival."

unit.utterance: e nye a mun gaw n tsawm ai.
unit.utterance_translation: Well, "My feathers are not beautiful."

unit.utterance: shakya mung n ngut ai.
unit.utterance_translation: "I haven't finished dressing up too."

unit.utterance: dai majaw ngai gaw n sa na nga ai majaw
unit.utterance_translation: Because (the Hkamhkam bird) said, "So, I will not go"

unit.utterance: shi hpe gaw
unit.utterance_translation: (the other birds said) to him

unit.utterance: oi sa ga ngu ai
unit.utterance_translation: (the other birds) said "Hey, let's go."

unit.utterance: "sa ga" ngu yang she
unit.utterance_translation: (They) said "Let's go," and

unit.utterance: "dai rai yang gaw ngai hpe bu hpun palawng shap ya mi" ngu yang
unit.utterance_translation: (he) said "Then, lend me your clothes" and

unit.utterance: "ke shap ya na" ngu nna she
unit.utterance_translation: (they) said "OK. (We) will lend (you dresses,)" and

unit.utterance: u ni gaw shi hpe e tinag lu ai mun kaw na shi a mun kaw shi a hkum kaw jun ya ai da.
unit.utterance_translation: the birds, from their feather, put (their feather) to his feather, to his body, it's said.

unit.utterance: u mun jun jun rai nna
unit.utterance_translation: (They) put their feathers (on him) and

unit.utterance: grai tsawm wa ai da shi wa.
unit.utterance_translation: he became very beautiful.

unit.utterance: grai tsawm wa nna
unit.utterance_translation: (He) became very beautiful and

unit.utterance: manau poi du rai yang gaw
unit.utterance_translation: (he) arrived at the Manau festival and

unit.utterance: manau poi kaw "ngai gaw tsawm dik re."
unit.utterance_translation: at the Manau festival (he) said "I'm the most beautiful."

unit.utterance: "ngai gaw u ni yawng hta tsawm dik ai re" nga na
unit.utterance_translation: "I am the most beautiful among birds" (he) said and

unit.utterance: shakawn chyu shakawn.
unit.utterance_translation: (he) only praised (himself).

unit.utterance: myi shi hpe u mun baw jaw nna shatsawm ai manang hpe pyi ga n kam shaga rai nna gumrawng ai da.
unit.utterance_translation: (He) was not even willing to speak to friends who gave him their feather by uprooting it, and he became haughty, it's said.

unit.utterance: rai yang she e
unit.utterance_translation: Then, well,

unit.utterance: shi shi dai zawn gumrawng gumtawng nau galaw ai majaw
unit.utterance_translation: because he became too haughty

unit.utterance: u ni wa shi hpe
unit.utterance_translation: the other birds (said) to him

unit.utterance: anhte a mun ni shabai la na ngu nna
unit.utterance_translation: "We will take back our feathers" and

unit.utterance: yawng u ni mun baw la ai da.
unit.utterance_translation: the birds plucked out all of his feathers, it's said.

unit.utterance: baw la nna
unit.utterance_translation: (They) plucked (them) and

unit.utterance: shi gaw myi na raw n tsawm ai mut mut rai yang gaw
unit.utterance_translation: he became gray like before and

unit.utterance: e gaya nna
unit.utterance_translation: well (he) became ashamed and

unit.utterance: hprawng makoi ra mat ai.
unit.utterance_translation: he had to run away and hide.

unit.utterance: dai shani kaw nna hkam hkam u gaw shani e shani e n shaga ai.
unit.utterance_translation: From that day, the Hkamhkam bird did not make sound during the day.

unit.utterance: shana yup tung e sha shaga ai.
unit.utterance_translation: He made a noise only at midnight.

unit.utterance: shana yup tung e sha
unit.utterance_translation: Only at midnight

unit.utterance: e nsin sin yang chyu sha shi tam lu tam sha hkawm mat ai.
unit.utterance_translation: well, only at midnight, only when it grew dark, he went, seeking food and drink

unit.utterance: dai gaw hkamhkam u a maumwi re.
unit.utterance_translation: This is the story of the Hkamhkam bird.

unit.utterance: gumrawng gumtawng ai majaw
unit.utterance_translation: Because he became haughty

unit.utterance: hkamhkam u gaw e shi masha ni jaw ai u manang ni jaw ai yawng baw gatut nna
unit.utterance_translation: the Hkamhkam bird had all his feather his friends gave to him plucked out and

unit.utterance: hpang jahtum gaw myi na raw n tsawm ai u bai tai ai sha n-ga
unit.utterance_translation: in the end, he also became an ugly bird

unit.utterance: shana nsin sin ai kaw she ngoi shaga ai u tai ai da.
unit.utterance_translation: he became a bird which makes noise only after it grows dark, it's said.
